summary: A group of Greek solders, who serve their military service in Kos, is sent to guard the skerry of Pitta. Everything looked normal until a Turkish boat disembarks 4 castaways on Pitta.
cast: Yannis Tsimitselis|Yorgos Seitaridis|Ioannis Papazisis|Socratis Patsikas|Stelios Xanthoudakis|Orfeas Avgoustidis|Vassilis Haralambopoulos|Vicky Kaya|Tugçe Kazaz|Arzu Yanardag|Yetkin Dikinciler|Metin Belgin|Renos Haralambidis|Turgay Tanülkü|Ram Saroop Swan|Maggie Bakir|Angela El-Zeind|Dimitris Liakopoulos|Apostolis Totsikas|Anthem Moss|Takis Spyridakis|Giannis Hatzigiannis|Vanesa Adamopoulou|Aris Bafaloukas|Dominic Bailey|Katerina Bei|Linda Borutta|Anett Bothe|Laura Carr|Thanos Chronis|Yonida Cipi|Khan Farsana|Giannis Filippou|Manos Goulias|Georgis Grigorakis|Ahmad Habach|Ahmet Hajisuleiman|Stefanos Hatzigiakoumis|Antonis Hatzis|Dimitris Hatzivogiatzis|Gordana Ignjatovic|Nikos Karapanos|Katerina Kiskila|Kyriaki Konsolaki|Olga Leontiadou|Nizam Madak|Nikolas Makris|Alicia Metcalf|Stavros Mitsis|Zinos Panagiotidis|Giannis Panagiotou|Vasilis Panagiotou|Giorgos Papadatos|Panagiotis Papadopoulos|Hristos Papagiannopoulos|John Raish|Nikos Sofos|Mihalis Svynos|Nikos Xypolitas
title: Loufa kai parallagi: Seirines sto Aigaio
